description.en-US: To play the game the player must pick up the chess pieces with "Space" and place it in the desired location, within the rules a standard chess game. There are different difficulty levels for beginner and advanced players. There is also a teaching mode that shows the player all the possible moves with the selected piece. You can choose different level of complexity and change the options by clicking "Select" ("Tab" - default)

summary.ar: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.bg: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.ca: Una lògica de joc de taula que es juga sobre un tauler d'escacs per a dos jugadors, combinant elements de l'art, la ciència i esports.
summary.cs: Logická desková hra, hraje na šachovnici pro dva hráče, kombinuje prvky umění, vědy a sportu.
summary.da: En logisk brætspil, der spilles på et skakbræt for to spillere, der kombinerer elementer af kunst, videnskab og sport.
summary.de: Eine logische Brettspiel, gespielt auf einem Schachbrett für zwei Spieler, das kombinieren der Elemente der Kunst, Wissenschaft und Sport.
summary.el: Μια λογική επιτραπέζιο παιχνίδι, που παίζεται σε μια σκακιέρα για δύο παίκτες, συνδυάζοντας στοιχεία από την τέχνη, την επιστήμη και τον αθλητισμό.
summary.en-GB: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.en-US: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.es: Una lógica, un juego de mesa jugado en un tablero de ajedrez para dos jugadores, que combina elementos del arte, la ciencia y el deporte.
summary.fa: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.fi: Looginen lautapeli pelataan shakkilaudalla kaksi pelaajaa, yhdistää elementtejä taiteen, tieteen ja urheilun.
summary.fr: Une logique de jeu de plateau, joue sur un échiquier pour deux joueurs, combinant des éléments de l'art, de la science et des sports.
summary.gu: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.he: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.hu: Logikai társasjáték, játszott a sakktáblát a két játékos, egyesíti elemeit, művészet, tudomány, sport.
summary.id: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.it: Un gioco da tavolo logico, giocato su una scacchiera per due giocatori, che combina elementi di arte, scienza e sport.

summary.mk: Логичка игра на табла, игра на шаховската табла за двајца играчи, комбинирање елементи на уметноста, науката и спортот.
summary.ms: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.nl: Een logische bordspel, dat gespeeld wordt op een schaakbord voor twee spelers, het combineren van elementen van kunst, wetenschap en sport.

summary.pt-BR: Um jogo de placa lógica, jogado em um tabuleiro para dois jogadores, combinando elementos de ciência, arte e esportes.
summary.pt-PT: Um jogo de placa lógica, jogado em um tabuleiro para dois jogadores, combinando elementos de ciência, arte e esportes.
summary.ro: A logical board game, played on a chessboard for two players, combining elements of art, science and sports.
summary.ru: Логическая игра со специальными фигурами для двух соперников, сочетающая в себе элементы искусства, науки и спорта.

summary.sl: Logično, namizna igra, ki se igra na šahovnici za dva igralca, ki združuje elemente umetnost, znanost in šport.
summary.sq: Një logjike e lojës, kanë luajtur në një fushë shahu për dy lojtarë, të kombinuar elemente të artit, shkencës dhe sportit.

summary.tr: Mantıksal bir masa oyunu, bir satranç tahtası üzerinde iki oyuncu oynadı, sanat, bilim ve spor öğeleri birleştiren.
summary.uk: Настільна логічна гра, грав на шаховій дошці для двох гравців, що поєднує в собі елементи мистецтва, науки і спорту.
